stimulusHtml: The surface designs on the prehistoric beaker with ibex motifs from Susa reflect the artistâ€™s interest in the natural world through which of the following characteristics?
choicesHtml: Their similarity to pictographs describing cycles of seasonal change
The naturalistic renderings of overlapping bulls running in herds
The stylistic depiction of various animals composed of geometric elements
Their resemblance to abstract symbols that represent constellations
